column2: Because she is an abuser as proved in court.
column26: Remove Amber Heard as an UN Human Rights Champion
column33: Remove Amber Heard as an UN Human Rights Champion
column34:
Amber Heard has been exposed as a domestic abuser by Johnny Depp. She flipped the script all theese years and is and has been projecting almost all the horrible acts she comitted upon Johnny to him. Telling the world with the help of media that Johnny Depp was abusing her during their entire relationship.

In the Virginia Defamation lawsuit there are multiple audio recordings showing Amber Heard admitting to abusing him, instigating fights, berating, gaslighting him, being the aggressor. One incident where she mocks Johnny’s experience of her hitting him, ”I was not punching you, bitch you were not punched, I was fucking hitting you”. Multiple witnesses confirms injuries and have photos (original metadata) on Johnny Depp with injuries and there has been no injuries on Amber Heard during their relationship.

Also, Amber Heard was arrested in 2009 for abusing a former domestic partner, Tasya Van Ree, demonstrating a repeated pattern of abuse by Amber Heard.

Since Heard's divorce from Johnny Depp, she has systematically crusaded to ruin Johnnys reputation, while trying to get back with him, repeating multiple accounts of fake incidents in which she had actually abused Johnny Depp, but lied and created false accounts of him being the abuser. The incident during which she shattered the bones in Johnny Depp's finger and nearly severed it, causing Depp to require surgery to reattach and repair it, and he retracted MRSA, nearly killing him. Heard presented a false story claiming that he cut off his finger himself, dipped it in paint and scrawled obscenities all over the walls. 

Likewise, Heard recounts fabricated incidents of Johnny Depp hitting her in the face when she had, in fact, punched him. Though staff and neighbors in the building where she lived reported seeing no marks on her face in the hours and days after she says Johnny Depp hit her, yet she appeared in court six (6) days later with bruises on her face, asking for a temporary restraining order, which was granted. Photos of Heard from the very next day show her full face, without makeup, and not a single bruise.

She is not fit to be an ambassador for the rights she says she stands for and then violates.

column2: As a true Survivor of DV and SA, it apalls me to listen to this woman's lies. Her body language speaks volumes, and ALL I needed to see, to KNOW she was being dishonest. If JD had a history of abuse, he would have gone down with the many men who were evicted from their powerful positions in Hollywood. No one else stood beside Amber Heard saying - yes,  JD did that to ME TOO. Not one! Although watching him beat up a few cupboard doors, probably would have affected me, intimidated me, frightened me, I'm a survivor after all, this had zero affect on her, she stood there, FEARLESSLY trying to video his outburst. I could go on and on here. But you get my point. She should NOT represent ABUSE SURVIVORS.

Amber Heard has been exposed as a domestic abuser by Johnny Depp. She flipped the script all theese years and is and has been projecting almost all the horrible acts she comitted upon Johnny to him. Telling the world with the help of media that Johnny Depp was abusing her during their entire relationship.

In the Virginia Defamation lawsuit there are multiple audio recordings showing Amber Heard admitting to abusing him, instigating fights, berating, gaslighting him, being the aggressor. One incident where she mocks Johnny’s experience of her hitting him, ”I was not punching you, bitch you were not punched, I was fucking hitting you”. Multiple witnesses confirms injuries and have photos (original metadata) on Johnny Depp with injuries and there has been no injuries on Amber Heard during their relationship.

Also, Amber Heard was arrested in 2009 for abusing a former domestic partner, Tasya Van Ree, demonstrating a repeated pattern of abuse by Amber Heard.

Since Heard's divorce from Johnny Depp, she has systematically crusaded to ruin Johnnys reputation, while trying to get back with him, repeating multiple accounts of fake incidents in which she had actually abused Johnny Depp, but lied and created false accounts of him being the abuser. The incident during which she shattered the bones in Johnny Depp's finger and nearly severed it, causing Depp to require surgery to reattach and repair it, and he retracted MRSA, nearly killing him. Heard presented a false story claiming that he cut off his finger himself, dipped it in paint and scrawled obscenities all over the walls. 

Likewise, Heard recounts fabricated incidents of Johnny Depp hitting her in the face when she had, in fact, punched him. Though staff and neighbors in the building where she lived reported seeing no marks on her face in the hours and days after she says Johnny Depp hit her, yet she appeared in court six (6) days later with bruises on her face, asking for a temporary restraining order, which was granted. Photos of Heard from the very next day show her full face, without makeup, and not a single bruise.

She is not fit to be an ambassador for the rights she says she stands for and then violates.

column26: Remove Amber Heard as an UN Human Rights Champion
column33: Remove Amber Heard as an UN Human Rights Champion
column34:
Amber Heard has been exposed as a domestic abuser by Johnny Depp. She flipped the script all theese years and is and has been projecting almost all the horrible acts she comitted upon Johnny to him. Telling the world with the help of media that Johnny Depp was abusing her during their entire relationship.

In the Virginia Defamation lawsuit there are multiple audio recordings showing Amber Heard admitting to abusing him, instigating fights, berating, gaslighting him, being the aggressor. One incident where she mocks Johnny’s experience of her hitting him, ”I was not punching you, bitch you were not punched, I was fucking hitting you”. Multiple witnesses confirms injuries and have photos (original metadata) on Johnny Depp with injuries and there has been no injuries on Amber Heard during their relationship.

Also, Amber Heard was arrested in 2009 for abusing a former domestic partner, Tasya Van Ree, demonstrating a repeated pattern of abuse by Amber Heard.

Since Heard's divorce from Johnny Depp, she has systematically crusaded to ruin Johnnys reputation, while trying to get back with him, repeating multiple accounts of fake incidents in which she had actually abused Johnny Depp, but lied and created false accounts of him being the abuser. The incident during which she shattered the bones in Johnny Depp's finger and nearly severed it, causing Depp to require surgery to reattach and repair it, and he retracted MRSA, nearly killing him. Heard presented a false story claiming that he cut off his finger himself, dipped it in paint and scrawled obscenities all over the walls. 

Likewise, Heard recounts fabricated incidents of Johnny Depp hitting her in the face when she had, in fact, punched him. Though staff and neighbors in the building where she lived reported seeing no marks on her face in the hours and days after she says Johnny Depp hit her, yet she appeared in court six (6) days later with bruises on her face, asking for a temporary restraining order, which was granted. Photos of Heard from the very next day show her full face, without makeup, and not a single bruise.

She is not fit to be an ambassador for the rights she says she stands for and then violates.

One incident where she mocks Johnny’s experience of her hitting him, ”I was not punching you, bitch you were not punched, I was fucking hitting you”. Multiple witnesses confirms injuries and have photos (original metadata) on Johnny Depp with injuries and there has been no injuries on Amber Heard during their relationship.

Also, Amber Heard was arrested in 2009 for abusing a former domestic partner, Tasya Van Ree, demonstrating a repeated pattern of abuse by Amber Heard.

Since Heard's divorce from Johnny Depp, she has systematically crusaded to ruin Johnnys reputation, while trying to get back with him, repeating multiple accounts of fake incidents in which she had actually abused Johnny Depp, but lied and created false accounts of him being the abuser. The incident during which she shattered the bones in Johnny Depp's finger and nearly severed it, causing Depp to require surgery to reattach and repair it, and he retracted MRSA, nearly killing him. Heard presented a false story claiming that he cut off his finger himself, dipped it in paint and scrawled obscenities all over the walls. 

Likewise, Heard recounts fabricated incidents of Johnny Depp hitting her in the face when she had, in fact, punched him. Though staff and neighbors in the building where she lived reported seeing no marks on her face in the hours and days after she says Johnny Depp hit her, yet she appeared in court six (6) days later with bruises on her face, asking for a temporary restraining order, which was granted. Photos of Heard from the very next day show her full face, without makeup, and not a single bruise.

She is not fit to be an ambassador for the rights she says she stands for and then violates.

column33: Remove Amber Heard as an UN Human Rights Champion
column34:
Amber Heard has been exposed as a domestic abuser by Johnny Depp. She flipped the script all theese years and is and has been projecting almost all the horrible acts she comitted upon Johnny to him. Telling the world with the help of media that Johnny Depp was abusing her during their entire relationship.

In the Virginia Defamation lawsuit there are multiple audio recordings showing Amber Heard admitting to abusing him, instigating fights, berating, gaslighting him, being the aggressor. One incident where she mocks Johnny’s experience of her hitting him, ”I was not punching you, bitch you were not punched, I was fucking hitting you”. Multiple witnesses confirms injuries and have photos (original metadata) on Johnny Depp with injuries and there has been no injuries on Amber Heard during their relationship.

Also, Amber Heard was arrested in 2009 for abusing a former domestic partner, Tasya Van Ree, demonstrating a repeated pattern of abuse by Amber Heard.

Since Heard's divorce from Johnny Depp, she has systematically crusaded to ruin Johnnys reputation, while trying to get back with him, repeating multiple accounts of fake incidents in which she had actually abused Johnny Depp, but lied and created false accounts of him being the abuser. The incident during which she shattered the bones in Johnny Depp's finger and nearly severed it, causing Depp to require surgery to reattach and repair it, and he retracted MRSA, nearly killing him. Heard presented a false story claiming that he cut off his finger himself, dipped it in paint and scrawled obscenities all over the walls. 

Likewise, Heard recounts fabricated incidents of Johnny Depp hitting her in the face when she had, in fact, punched him. Though staff and neighbors in the building where she lived reported seeing no marks on her face in the hours and days after she says Johnny Depp hit her, yet she appeared in court six (6) days later with bruises on her face, asking for a temporary restraining order, which was granted. Photos of Heard from the very next day show her full face, without makeup, and not a single bruise.

She is not fit to be an ambassador for the rights she says she stands for and then violates.

column33: Remove Amber Heard as an UN Human Rights Champion
column34:
Amber Heard has been exposed as a domestic abuser by Johnny Depp. She flipped the script all theese years and is and has been projecting almost all the horrible acts she comitted upon Johnny to him. Telling the world with the help of media that Johnny Depp was abusing her during their entire relationship.

In the Virginia Defamation lawsuit there are multiple audio recordings showing Amber Heard admitting to abusing him, instigating fights, berating, gaslighting him, being the aggressor. One incident where she mocks Johnny’s experience of her hitting him, ”I was not punching you, bitch you were not punched, I was fucking hitting you”. Multiple witnesses confirms injuries and have photos (original metadata) on Johnny Depp with injuries and there has been no injuries on Amber Heard during their relationship.

Also, Amber Heard was arrested in 2009 for abusing a former domestic partner, Tasya Van Ree, demonstrating a repeated pattern of abuse by Amber Heard.

Since Heard's divorce from Johnny Depp, she has systematically crusaded to ruin Johnnys reputation, while trying to get back with him, repeating multiple accounts of fake incidents in which she had actually abused Johnny Depp, but lied and created false accounts of him being the abuser. The incident during which she shattered the bones in Johnny Depp's finger and nearly severed it, causing Depp to require surgery to reattach and repair it, and he retracted MRSA, nearly killing him. Heard presented a false story claiming that he cut off his finger himself, dipped it in paint and scrawled obscenities all over the walls. 

Likewise, Heard recounts fabricated incidents of Johnny Depp hitting her in the face when she had, in fact, punched him. Though staff and neighbors in the building where she lived reported seeing no marks on her face in the hours and days after she says Johnny Depp hit her, yet she appeared in court six (6) days later with bruises on her face, asking for a temporary restraining order, which was granted. Photos of Heard from the very next day show her full face, without makeup, and not a single bruise.

She is not fit to be an ambassador for the rights she says she stands for and then violates.

In the Virginia Defamation lawsuit there are multiple audio recordings showing Amber Heard admitting to abusing him, instigating fights, berating, gaslighting him, being the aggressor. One incident where she mocks Johnny’s experience of her hitting him, ”I was not punching you, bitch you were not punched, I was fucking hitting you”. Multiple witnesses confirms injuries and have photos (original metadata) on Johnny Depp with injuries and there has been no injuries on Amber Heard during their relationship.

Also, Amber Heard was arrested in 2009 for abusing a former domestic partner, Tasya Van Ree, demonstrating a repeated pattern of abuse by Amber Heard.

Since Heard's divorce from Johnny Depp, she has systematically crusaded to ruin Johnnys reputation, while trying to get back with him, repeating multiple accounts of fake incidents in which she had actually abused Johnny Depp, but lied and created false accounts of him being the abuser. The incident during which she shattered the bones in Johnny Depp's finger and nearly severed it, causing Depp to require surgery to reattach and repair it, and he retracted MRSA, nearly killing him. Heard presented a false story claiming that he cut off his finger himself, dipped it in paint and scrawled obscenities all over the walls. 

Likewise, Heard recounts fabricated incidents of Johnny Depp hitting her in the face when she had, in fact, punched him. Though staff and neighbors in the building where she lived reported seeing no marks on her face in the hours and days after she says Johnny Depp hit her, yet she appeared in court six (6) days later with bruises on her face, asking for a temporary restraining order, which was granted. Photos of Heard from the very next day show her full face, without makeup, and not a single bruise.

She is not fit to be an ambassador for the rights she says she stands for and then violates.

column2:
She is dishonest. She has lied over and over. She keeps saying she wants Johnny to leave her alone. He isn’t even in the US. Having Amber Heard as the face of the UN HUMAN RIGHTS IS WRONG ON EVERY LEVEL! I will never believe anything that comes out of her mouth.  . Having her face and name associated with the UN shows you don’t care about the women and men who are in Abusive relationships and feel they can’t get out. Over 40 years ago I was in a marriage where my husband did beat me up. You don’t forget. You don’t have to add to or take away from what happened to you. You can forgive but forget NEVER. All Amber Heard as done is lie on the stand. Don’t forget men get abused too. Any consideration in this matter is greatly appreciated. 
Thank You
Marilyn Eubanks/Shreveport, Louisiana 
This is my signature.

column2: I am an actual survivor of kidnapping, hostage taking, DV, SA, etc., and I promise you, from my very soul I promise you! Amber Heard is a DV abuser, a bully, a disturbed woman, a delusional phony baloney, and she’s cruel and criminal and trashy. I am incensed that she was wrongly honored as a human rights champion. It is a TRAVESTY! I am so upset about this, deeply so! I am triggered snd insulted by it! She is classist, cruel, dishonest, racist, and insufferable. She has a lifetime of abusing people and telling lies and committing crimes. She’s vile.  You have made a mistake. Mistakes happen to us all.  Please FIX IT! Remove her! She is no voice for women. It will be a cold day in Hell before she ever speaks for me! Please do not degrade the UN. Please! Please fix your mistake!

column26: Remove Amber Heard as an UN Human Rights Champion
column33: Remove Amber Heard as an UN Human Rights Champion
column34:
Amber Heard has been exposed as a domestic abuser by Johnny Depp. She flipped the script all theese years and is and has been projecting almost all the horrible acts she comitted upon Johnny to him. Telling the world with the help of media that Johnny Depp was abusing her during their entire relationship.

In the Virginia Defamation lawsuit there are multiple audio recordings showing Amber Heard admitting to abusing him, instigating fights, berating, gaslighting him, being the aggressor. One incident where she mocks Johnny’s experience of her hitting him, ”I was not punching you, bitch you were not punched, I was fucking hitting you”. Multiple witnesses confirms injuries and have photos (original metadata) on Johnny Depp with injuries and there has been no injuries on Amber Heard during their relationship.

Also, Amber Heard was arrested in 2009 for abusing a former domestic partner, Tasya Van Ree, demonstrating a repeated pattern of abuse by Amber Heard.

Since Heard's divorce from Johnny Depp, she has systematically crusaded to ruin Johnnys reputation, while trying to get back with him, repeating multiple accounts of fake incidents in which she had actually abused Johnny Depp, but lied and created false accounts of him being the abuser. The incident during which she shattered the bones in Johnny Depp's finger and nearly severed it, causing Depp to require surgery to reattach and repair it, and he retracted MRSA, nearly killing him. Heard presented a false story claiming that he cut off his finger himself, dipped it in paint and scrawled obscenities all over the walls. 

Likewise, Heard recounts fabricated incidents of Johnny Depp hitting her in the face when she had, in fact, punched him. Though staff and neighbors in the building where she lived reported seeing no marks on her face in the hours and days after she says Johnny Depp hit her, yet she appeared in court six (6) days later with bruises on her face, asking for a temporary restraining order, which was granted. Photos of Heard from the very next day show her full face, without makeup, and not a single bruise.

She is not fit to be an ambassador for the rights she says she stands for and then violates.

column144: Remove Amber Heard as an UN Human Rights Champion

column2: The evidence from the trial clearly showed that she was the abuser and not the survivor of abuse. She is using a false status of "survivor" to pose as an ambassador for human rights. Amber's own words during cross, the audio, and the witnesses verified that her claim as the survivor of abuse was false. As a survivor of childhood SA, I was mortified watching the trail as Amber's continued to gaslight everyone including her true victim. That was very triggering for me. Someone like her should not be the face representing human rights and those affected by it. She has no right to speak for them. She certainly doesn't speak for me as an SA survivor.

column2: UN must take immediate action to remove Amber Heard and appoint far good role model like Camille Vasquez who truly represents justice and speaks volume about human rights ,women empowerment & education. Amber Heard is not fit for the position, misrepresented and also exploiting metoo movement, leveraging of innocent people and abuse the power of fame, feminism and also committing violence by hitting his ex husband. We do not need Amber Heard to represent the voice of victims when it's clearly she admitted in the tapes she recorded she was hitting, abusing Johnny Depp verbally and physically and also trying to control him which is the opposite of freedom of speech and will. She needs to be treated and separated from society as she had nearly caused Johnny depp to suicidal by mocking and abuse him mentally.

column33: Remove Amber Heard as an UN Human Rights Champion
column34:
Amber Heard has been exposed as a domestic abuser by Johnny Depp. She flipped the script all theese years and is and has been projecting almost all the horrible acts she comitted upon Johnny to him. Telling the world with the help of media that Johnny Depp was abusing her during their entire relationship.

In the Virginia Defamation lawsuit there are multiple audio recordings showing Amber Heard admitting to abusing him, instigating fights, berating, gaslighting him, being the aggressor. One incident where she mocks Johnny’s experience of her hitting him, ”I was not punching you, bitch you were not punched, I was fucking hitting you”. Multiple witnesses confirms injuries and have photos (original metadata) on Johnny Depp with injuries and there has been no injuries on Amber Heard during their relationship.

Also, Amber Heard was arrested in 2009 for abusing a former domestic partner, Tasya Van Ree, demonstrating a repeated pattern of abuse by Amber Heard.

Since Heard's divorce from Johnny Depp, she has systematically crusaded to ruin Johnnys reputation, while trying to get back with him, repeating multiple accounts of fake incidents in which she had actually abused Johnny Depp, but lied and created false accounts of him being the abuser. The incident during which she shattered the bones in Johnny Depp's finger and nearly severed it, causing Depp to require surgery to reattach and repair it, and he retracted MRSA, nearly killing him. Heard presented a false story claiming that he cut off his finger himself, dipped it in paint and scrawled obscenities all over the walls. 

Likewise, Heard recounts fabricated incidents of Johnny Depp hitting her in the face when she had, in fact, punched him. Though staff and neighbors in the building where she lived reported seeing no marks on her face in the hours and days after she says Johnny Depp hit her, yet she appeared in court six (6) days later with bruises on her face, asking for a temporary restraining order, which was granted. Photos of Heard from the very next day show her full face, without makeup, and not a single bruise.

She is not fit to be an ambassador for the rights she says she stands for and then violates.

column34:
Amber Heard has been exposed as a domestic abuser by Johnny Depp. She flipped the script all theese years and is and has been projecting almost all the horrible acts she comitted upon Johnny to him. Telling the world with the help of media that Johnny Depp was abusing her during their entire relationship.

In the Virginia Defamation lawsuit there are multiple audio recordings showing Amber Heard admitting to abusing him, instigating fights, berating, gaslighting him, being the aggressor. One incident where she mocks Johnny’s experience of her hitting him, ”I was not punching you, bitch you were not punched, I was fucking hitting you”. Multiple witnesses confirms injuries and have photos (original metadata) on Johnny Depp with injuries and there has been no injuries on Amber Heard during their relationship.

Also, Amber Heard was arrested in 2009 for abusing a former domestic partner, Tasya Van Ree, demonstrating a repeated pattern of abuse by Amber Heard.

Since Heard's divorce from Johnny Depp, she has systematically crusaded to ruin Johnnys reputation, while trying to get back with him, repeating multiple accounts of fake incidents in which she had actually abused Johnny Depp, but lied and created false accounts of him being the abuser. The incident during which she shattered the bones in Johnny Depp's finger and nearly severed it, causing Depp to require surgery to reattach and repair it, and he retracted MRSA, nearly killing him. Heard presented a false story claiming that he cut off his finger himself, dipped it in paint and scrawled obscenities all over the walls. 

Likewise, Heard recounts fabricated incidents of Johnny Depp hitting her in the face when she had, in fact, punched him. Though staff and neighbors in the building where she lived reported seeing no marks on her face in the hours and days after she says Johnny Depp hit her, yet she appeared in court six (6) days later with bruises on her face, asking for a temporary restraining order, which was granted. Photos of Heard from the very next day show her full face, without makeup, and not a single bruise.

She is not fit to be an ambassador for the rights she says she stands for and then violates.

column2: Amber Heard never deserved the title. She is not a abused victim.  She seemed very fake on the stand. Nothing she said added up. I am a dv survivor, she did not come off as a victim. column34:
Amber Heard has been exposed as a domestic abuser by Johnny Depp. She flipped the script all theese years and is and has been projecting almost all the horrible acts she comitted upon Johnny to him. Telling the world with the help of media that Johnny Depp was abusing her during their entire relationship.

In the Virginia Defamation lawsuit there are multiple audio recordings showing Amber Heard admitting to abusing him, instigating fights, berating, gaslighting him, being the aggressor. One incident where she mocks Johnny’s experience of her hitting him, ”I was not punching you, bitch you were not punched, I was fucking hitting you”. Multiple witnesses confirms injuries and have photos (original metadata) on Johnny Depp with injuries and there has been no injuries on Amber Heard during their relationship.

Also, Amber Heard was arrested in 2009 for abusing a former domestic partner, Tasya Van Ree, demonstrating a repeated pattern of abuse by Amber Heard.

Since Heard's divorce from Johnny Depp, she has systematically crusaded to ruin Johnnys reputation, while trying to get back with him, repeating multiple accounts of fake incidents in which she had actually abused Johnny Depp, but lied and created false accounts of him being the abuser. The incident during which she shattered the bones in Johnny Depp's finger and nearly severed it, causing Depp to require surgery to reattach and repair it, and he retracted MRSA, nearly killing him. Heard presented a false story claiming that he cut off his finger himself, dipped it in paint and scrawled obscenities all over the walls. 

Likewise, Heard recounts fabricated incidents of Johnny Depp hitting her in the face when she had, in fact, punched him. Though staff and neighbors in the building where she lived reported seeing no marks on her face in the hours and days after she says Johnny Depp hit her, yet she appeared in court six (6) days later with bruises on her face, asking for a temporary restraining order, which was granted. Photos of Heard from the very next day show her full face, without makeup, and not a single bruise.

She is not fit to be an ambassador for the rights she says she stands for and then violates.

column33: Remove Amber Heard as an UN Human Rights Champion
column34:
Amber Heard has been exposed as a domestic abuser by Johnny Depp. She flipped the script all theese years and is and has been projecting almost all the horrible acts she comitted upon Johnny to him. Telling the world with the help of media that Johnny Depp was abusing her during their entire relationship.

In the Virginia Defamation lawsuit there are multiple audio recordings showing Amber Heard admitting to abusing him, instigating fights, berating, gaslighting him, being the aggressor. One incident where she mocks Johnny’s experience of her hitting him, ”I was not punching you, bitch you were not punched, I was fucking hitting you”. Multiple witnesses confirms injuries and have photos (original metadata) on Johnny Depp with injuries and there has been no injuries on Amber Heard during their relationship.

Also, Amber Heard was arrested in 2009 for abusing a former domestic partner, Tasya Van Ree, demonstrating a repeated pattern of abuse by Amber Heard.

Since Heard's divorce from Johnny Depp, she has systematically crusaded to ruin Johnnys reputation, while trying to get back with him, repeating multiple accounts of fake incidents in which she had actually abused Johnny Depp, but lied and created false accounts of him being the abuser. The incident during which she shattered the bones in Johnny Depp's finger and nearly severed it, causing Depp to require surgery to reattach and repair it, and he retracted MRSA, nearly killing him. Heard presented a false story claiming that he cut off his finger himself, dipped it in paint and scrawled obscenities all over the walls. 

Likewise, Heard recounts fabricated incidents of Johnny Depp hitting her in the face when she had, in fact, punched him. Though staff and neighbors in the building where she lived reported seeing no marks on her face in the hours and days after she says Johnny Depp hit her, yet she appeared in court six (6) days later with bruises on her face, asking for a temporary restraining order, which was granted. Photos of Heard from the very next day show her full face, without makeup, and not a single bruise.

She is not fit to be an ambassador for the rights she says she stands for and then violates.

That status as representing anything other than Hollywood imaginary characters should be removed if it in any way represents others.
column26: Remove Amber Heard as an UN Human Rights Champion
column33: Remove Amber Heard as an UN Human Rights Champion
column34:
Amber Heard has been exposed as a domestic abuser by Johnny Depp. She flipped the script all theese years and is and has been projecting almost all the horrible acts she comitted upon Johnny to him. Telling the world with the help of media that Johnny Depp was abusing her during their entire relationship.

In the Virginia Defamation lawsuit there are multiple audio recordings showing Amber Heard admitting to abusing him, instigating fights, berating, gaslighting him, being the aggressor. One incident where she mocks Johnny’s experience of her hitting him, ”I was not punching you, bitch you were not punched, I was fucking hitting you”. Multiple witnesses confirms injuries and have photos (original metadata) on Johnny Depp with injuries and there has been no injuries on Amber Heard during their relationship.

Also, Amber Heard was arrested in 2009 for abusing a former domestic partner, Tasya Van Ree, demonstrating a repeated pattern of abuse by Amber Heard.

Since Heard's divorce from Johnny Depp, she has systematically crusaded to ruin Johnnys reputation, while trying to get back with him, repeating multiple accounts of fake incidents in which she had actually abused Johnny Depp, but lied and created false accounts of him being the abuser. The incident during which she shattered the bones in Johnny Depp's finger and nearly severed it, causing Depp to require surgery to reattach and repair it, and he retracted MRSA, nearly killing him. Heard presented a false story claiming that he cut off his finger himself, dipped it in paint and scrawled obscenities all over the walls. 

Likewise, Heard recounts fabricated incidents of Johnny Depp hitting her in the face when she had, in fact, punched him. Though staff and neighbors in the building where she lived reported seeing no marks on her face in the hours and days after she says Johnny Depp hit her, yet she appeared in court six (6) days later with bruises on her face, asking for a temporary restraining order, which was granted. Photos of Heard from the very next day show her full face, without makeup, and not a single bruise.

She is not fit to be an ambassador for the rights she says she stands for and then violates.

Multiple witnesses confirms injuries and have photos (original metadata) on Johnny Depp with injuries and there has been no injuries on Amber Heard during their relationship.

Also, Amber Heard was arrested in 2009 for abusing a former domestic partner, Tasya Van Ree, demonstrating a repeated pattern of abuse by Amber Heard.

Since Heard's divorce from Johnny Depp, she has systematically crusaded to ruin Johnnys reputation, while trying to get back with him, repeating multiple accounts of fake incidents in which she had actually abused Johnny Depp, but lied and created false accounts of him being the abuser. The incident during which she shattered the bones in Johnny Depp's finger and nearly severed it, causing Depp to require surgery to reattach and repair it, and he retracted MRSA, nearly killing him. Heard presented a false story claiming that he cut off his finger himself, dipped it in paint and scrawled obscenities all over the walls. 

Likewise, Heard recounts fabricated incidents of Johnny Depp hitting her in the face when she had, in fact, punched him. Though staff and neighbors in the building where she lived reported seeing no marks on her face in the hours and days after she says Johnny Depp hit her, yet she appeared in court six (6) days later with bruises on her face, asking for a temporary restraining order, which was granted. Photos of Heard from the very next day show her full face, without makeup, and not a single bruise.

She is not fit to be an ambassador for the rights she says she stands for and then violates.

column33: Remove Amber Heard as an UN Human Rights Champion
column34:
Amber Heard has been exposed as a domestic abuser by Johnny Depp. She flipped the script all theese years and is and has been projecting almost all the horrible acts she comitted upon Johnny to him. Telling the world with the help of media that Johnny Depp was abusing her during their entire relationship.

In the Virginia Defamation lawsuit there are multiple audio recordings showing Amber Heard admitting to abusing him, instigating fights, berating, gaslighting him, being the aggressor. One incident where she mocks Johnny’s experience of her hitting him, ”I was not punching you, bitch you were not punched, I was fucking hitting you”. Multiple witnesses confirms injuries and have photos (original metadata) on Johnny Depp with injuries and there has been no injuries on Amber Heard during their relationship.

Also, Amber Heard was arrested in 2009 for abusing a former domestic partner, Tasya Van Ree, demonstrating a repeated pattern of abuse by Amber Heard.

Since Heard's divorce from Johnny Depp, she has systematically crusaded to ruin Johnnys reputation, while trying to get back with him, repeating multiple accounts of fake incidents in which she had actually abused Johnny Depp, but lied and created false accounts of him being the abuser. The incident during which she shattered the bones in Johnny Depp's finger and nearly severed it, causing Depp to require surgery to reattach and repair it, and he retracted MRSA, nearly killing him. Heard presented a false story claiming that he cut off his finger himself, dipped it in paint and scrawled obscenities all over the walls. 

Likewise, Heard recounts fabricated incidents of Johnny Depp hitting her in the face when she had, in fact, punched him. Though staff and neighbors in the building where she lived reported seeing no marks on her face in the hours and days after she says Johnny Depp hit her, yet she appeared in court six (6) days later with bruises on her face, asking for a temporary restraining order, which was granted. Photos of Heard from the very next day show her full face, without makeup, and not a single bruise.

She is not fit to be an ambassador for the rights she says she stands for and then violates.

column2: Amber heard eine pathologische Lügnerin ist und ihr alle Menschen egal sind wenn es darum geht zu bekommen was sie will. Das Einzige das für Frau Heard zählt, ist sie selbst. Eine erdückenede Beweislast entlarvt sie als Tätetin von häuslicher Gewalt. Sie lügt immer wieder unter Eid. So jemand kann von Menschenrechtsvertretern nicht vertreten werden. Sie tritt Gesetze, Ethik, Moral und alle Menschen die ihr im Weg stehen mit Füßen und benutzt auch charities, movements wie die 'me too'  und Organisationen um ihren wahren Charakter zu verbergen. Diese Frau sollte unter keinen Umständen die UN repräsentieren.
column26: Remove Amber Heard as an UN Human Rights Champion
column33: Remove Amber Heard as an UN Human Rights Champion
column34:
Amber Heard has been exposed as a domestic abuser by Johnny Depp. She flipped the script all theese years and is and has been projecting almost all the horrible acts she comitted upon Johnny to him. Telling the world with the help of media that Johnny Depp was abusing her during their entire relationship.

In the Virginia Defamation lawsuit there are multiple audio recordings showing Amber Heard admitting to abusing him, instigating fights, berating, gaslighting him, being the aggressor. One incident where she mocks Johnny’s experience of her hitting him, ”I was not punching you, bitch you were not punched, I was fucking hitting you”. Multiple witnesses confirms injuries and have photos (original metadata) on Johnny Depp with injuries and there has been no injuries on Amber Heard during their relationship.

Also, Amber Heard was arrested in 2009 for abusing a former domestic partner, Tasya Van Ree, demonstrating a repeated pattern of abuse by Amber Heard.

Since Heard's divorce from Johnny Depp, she has systematically crusaded to ruin Johnnys reputation, while trying to get back with him, repeating multiple accounts of fake incidents in which she had actually abused Johnny Depp, but lied and created false accounts of him being the abuser. The incident during which she shattered the bones in Johnny Depp's finger and nearly severed it, causing Depp to require surgery to reattach and repair it, and he retracted MRSA, nearly killing him. Heard presented a false story claiming that he cut off his finger himself, dipped it in paint and scrawled obscenities all over the walls. 

Likewise, Heard recounts fabricated incidents of Johnny Depp hitting her in the face when she had, in fact, punched him. Though staff and neighbors in the building where she lived reported seeing no marks on her face in the hours and days after she says Johnny Depp hit her, yet she appeared in court six (6) days later with bruises on her face, asking for a temporary restraining order, which was granted. Photos of Heard from the very next day show her full face, without makeup, and not a single bruise.

She is not fit to be an ambassador for the rights she says she stands for and then violates.

column34:
Amber Heard has been exposed as a domestic abuser by Johnny Depp. She flipped the script all theese years and is and has been projecting almost all the horrible acts she comitted upon Johnny to him. Telling the world with the help of media that Johnny Depp was abusing her during their entire relationship.

In the Virginia Defamation lawsuit there are multiple audio recordings showing Amber Heard admitting to abusing him, instigating fights, berating, gaslighting him, being the aggressor. One incident where she mocks Johnny’s experience of her hitting him, ”I was not punching you, bitch you were not punched, I was fucking hitting you”. Multiple witnesses confirms injuries and have photos (original metadata) on Johnny Depp with injuries and there has been no injuries on Amber Heard during their relationship.

Also, Amber Heard was arrested in 2009 for abusing a former domestic partner, Tasya Van Ree, demonstrating a repeated pattern of abuse by Amber Heard.

Since Heard's divorce from Johnny Depp, she has systematically crusaded to ruin Johnnys reputation, while trying to get back with him, repeating multiple accounts of fake incidents in which she had actually abused Johnny Depp, but lied and created false accounts of him being the abuser. The incident during which she shattered the bones in Johnny Depp's finger and nearly severed it, causing Depp to require surgery to reattach and repair it, and he retracted MRSA, nearly killing him. Heard presented a false story claiming that he cut off his finger himself, dipped it in paint and scrawled obscenities all over the walls. 

Likewise, Heard recounts fabricated incidents of Johnny Depp hitting her in the face when she had, in fact, punched him. Though staff and neighbors in the building where she lived reported seeing no marks on her face in the hours and days after she says Johnny Depp hit her, yet she appeared in court six (6) days later with bruises on her face, asking for a temporary restraining order, which was granted. Photos of Heard from the very next day show her full face, without makeup, and not a single bruise.

She is not fit to be an ambassador for the rights she says she stands for and then violates.

column2: She is a sick liar
column26: Remove Amber Heard as an UN Human Rights Champion
column33: Remove Amber Heard as an UN Human Rights Champion
column34:
Amber Heard has been exposed as a domestic abuser by Johnny Depp. She flipped the script all theese years and is and has been projecting almost all the horrible acts she comitted upon Johnny to him. Telling the world with the help of media that Johnny Depp was abusing her during their entire relationship.

In the Virginia Defamation lawsuit there are multiple audio recordings showing Amber Heard admitting to abusing him, instigating fights, berating, gaslighting him, being the aggressor. One incident where she mocks Johnny’s experience of her hitting him, ”I was not punching you, bitch you were not punched, I was fucking hitting you”. Multiple witnesses confirms injuries and have photos (original metadata) on Johnny Depp with injuries and there has been no injuries on Amber Heard during their relationship.

Also, Amber Heard was arrested in 2009 for abusing a former domestic partner, Tasya Van Ree, demonstrating a repeated pattern of abuse by Amber Heard.

Since Heard's divorce from Johnny Depp, she has systematically crusaded to ruin Johnnys reputation, while trying to get back with him, repeating multiple accounts of fake incidents in which she had actually abused Johnny Depp, but lied and created false accounts of him being the abuser. The incident during which she shattered the bones in Johnny Depp's finger and nearly severed it, causing Depp to require surgery to reattach and repair it, and he retracted MRSA, nearly killing him. Heard presented a false story claiming that he cut off his finger himself, dipped it in paint and scrawled obscenities all over the walls. 

Likewise, Heard recounts fabricated incidents of Johnny Depp hitting her in the face when she had, in fact, punched him. Though staff and neighbors in the building where she lived reported seeing no marks on her face in the hours and days after she says Johnny Depp hit her, yet she appeared in court six (6) days later with bruises on her face, asking for a temporary restraining order, which was granted. Photos of Heard from the very next day show her full face, without makeup, and not a single bruise.

She is not fit to be an ambassador for the rights she says she stands for and then violates.

Heard presented a false story claiming that he cut off his finger himself, dipped it in paint and scrawled obscenities all over the walls. 

Likewise, Heard recounts fabricated incidents of Johnny Depp hitting her in the face when she had, in fact, punched him. Though staff and neighbors in the building where she lived reported seeing no marks on her face in the hours and days after she says Johnny Depp hit her, yet she appeared in court six (6) days later with bruises on her face, asking for a temporary restraining order, which was granted. Photos of Heard from the very next day show her full face, without makeup, and not a single bruise.

She is not fit to be an ambassador for the rights she says she stands for and then violates.
